response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $12,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and value, I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $11,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that meets your needs and exceeds your expectations at a highly competitive rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11000}
